p: Diuresis could be beneficial for treatment of a number of disease conditions such as congestive heart failure, nephritic syndrome, hypertension, liver cirrhosis, poisoning, and certain kidney diseases. It is also important in kidney stone treatment. An increased fluid volume flowing through the kidney could dissolve the stones, and flush out the deposits. 21 In addition to conventional drugs, numerous herbal preparations are used as diuretics. There are also scientific studies that have been carried out to support the diuretic effects of many traditional medicinal herbal products. 22
